page.title: 16Our School Cleaners
page.content: The caretaker looks after our school, with cleaners to help him. We like our caretaker because he always keeps our school clean and tidy. He comes to school at 7 o'clock every morning and he and the cleaners make sure the school is ready for us to start at 9 o'clock. They come back when we finish at half past 3 and clean up after us. The caretaker is in the canteen before dinner to put out the tables and benches for us. After dinner he puts them away and sweeps the canteen floor. The cleaners clean the school toilets with disinfectant to kill the germs and they wipe the sinks. If we lose a ball on the school roof the caretaker climbs up and gets it down for us.
